channel.title: My Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My Hugo Site

item.title: The nature of information problem
item.description:
Today in class, I learned how images are made using pixels and RGB values.
I understood how to transform images by blurring and changing them horizontally.
These activities helped me see how computers process and edit pictures.
The lesson was interesting and improved my understanding of digital images.

item.title: Class Reflection
item.description:
DIKW MODEL

In todayâ€™s class, I learned about DIKW, which means Data, Information, Knowledge, and Wisdom. Data is simple facts, and information helps us understand those facts. Knowledge teaches us how to use this information in real life. Wisdom helps us make good and correct decisions using what we learn.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Zettlr is a helpful tool for writing notes and organizing ideas. I used Zettlr to write my reflections and learning notes. It is easy to use and saves my work in Markdown format, which is useful for creating blogs and websites.
